title: So this just happened to me...
body: I had a game today as Caitlyn as shown in the link. As you can see my KD is 22/2/5 and got an A- and yesterday i went 21/8/8 and an S. Like what is this riot?

replies.body: Can people fkin read sometimes? It's not just about KDA {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

You also need to look at CS and total kills
I think it's dependent on those things
If your team gets 80 kills and you went 10-0-5, you're not going to get S+
If your teammates all have 300+cs and you have 50, you're not going to get S+

> [{quoted}](name=FideiAngelus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5wYHEoEc,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-01T05:04:24.713+0000)
>
> You also need to look at CS and total kills
> I think it's dependent on those things
> If your team gets 80 kills and you went 10-0-5, you're not going to get S+
> If your teammates all have 300+cs and you have 50, you're not going to get S+

+ map control warding objective assists and tower kills

You want an S- or higher and yet you only got 169cs. If I had 169cs on an ADC at 30 minutes regardless of kills I'd feel bad.

As per the other comment. Read how the grading works, it has only a small proportion to do with KDA.
